item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1478; 08:22PM; 1029 S Cochran Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EfRQvl; Mid-Wilshire; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending into the attic. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E226 E261 E294 E61 E68 RA29 RA61 RA829 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1478; 08:00PM; 1029 S Cochran Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EfRQvl; Mid-Wilshire; Two story, single family dwelling with heavy fire showing on the first floor. There are no additional buildings exposed at this time. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 4; BC18 BC5 E226 E261 E294 E61 E68 RA29 RA61 RA829 T26 T61 T94; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Structure Fire - FATALITY FATALITY 11/30/2021 INC#1272

item.description: Update FATALITY Structure Fire - FATALITY; INC#1272; 06:27PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; Firefighters continued searching through at least 4' of debris and located an adult female victim, determined deceased on scene. There are reports of two additional occupants who may have departed the scene prior but their locations are unknown at this time and crews continue to search the heavily packed residence. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is responding for the investigation per protocol for a fatality. PIO Captain Erik Scott is enroute to the scene for media availability. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AR1 BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1272; 06:10PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; Firefighters completed a secondary search and found no one. Information gathered on scene by incident command indicate the occupant is not home. Cause and $ loss TBD. The two exposed homes on either side of the fire unit were defended from damage. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1272; 05:57PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; KNOCKDOWN: 31 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes. They encountered excessive storage conditions which hampered access to the seat of the fire. The occupant is unaccounted for and firefighters are worked to complete a primary search, made more challenging due to the storage in the home. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1272; 05:31PM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; Fire showing from a mobile home. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E107 E287 E296 E305 E70 RA107 RA96 T105 T87; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#0812; 01:20PM; 1838 N Fuller Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xCISpm; Hollywood Hills West; LAFD Air Operations is preparing to conduct a hoist operation and transport (in Runyon Canyon) for an approximately 80yo male hiker in medical distress. The original 9-1-1 call received at 12:59PM. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC5 E227 E41 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 RA27 RH114 T27; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1689; 11:59PM; 145 W 99th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3llcu5E; Broadway-Manchester; Firefighters responded to a structure fire at a two story multi-unit building (group/care home type facility) and found a fire out (held in check by sprinkler). They located and transported one 58 yo female patient with critical burn injuries. Initial investigation of cause of fire and injuries appear to be smoking in bed. The initial 9-1-1 call was received at 11:31PM. No further details. ; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 E65 RA64 RA864 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#1137; 05:30PM; 46 Saddlebow Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3d324Di; outside city; Ventura Co Fire and LAFD worked together to safely rescue an (elderly) adult male from approximately 200' down a cliff side. While his vehicle did not go down the cliff (it was teetering and a few more feet would have caused it to go down), when he exited the car he lost his balance and fell down the very steep (too steep for rescuers to walk down) hill side. VCFD helicopter conducted the hoist operation and air ambulance. Fortunately, the patient did not appear to have any life threatening injuries. LAFD Heavy Rescue is on scene to assist with pulling the vehicle back to the road. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 4:24PM. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 3147.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; AO1 AO2 BC14 BC17 E105 E289 E305 E89 E90 EM17 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA106 RA3 RA5 RA89 RH114 T105 T89 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

FATALITY Physical Rescue; INC#1644; 12:30AM; 5006 N Odessa Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ro1GrD; Encino; Sadly, one person perished due to a tree falling into the two-story home. LAFD firefighters, heavy rescue, and urban search and rescue teams will continue working together to remove the tree. LAPD, Coroner, and Mayor's Crisis Response Team responding. PIO Captain Cody Weireter en route.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC14 E109 E288 E289 E83 E88 E89 EM17 HE1 HR3 PI3 RA100 RA83 RA88 RA889 RA90 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange
